artefact: Temporary export licence for cultural goods

artefact.overview: You need an export licence to loan cultural goods over a certain age or value from a museum or gallery to an exhibition abroad or to take cultural goods abroad temporarily for sale or private enjoyment
artefact.licence_short_description: Export licence to loan cultural goods over a certain age or value from a museum or gallery to an exhibition abroad or to take cultural goods abroad temporarily.
artefact.licence_overview: To loan works of art or other cultural goods over a certain age and value from a museum or art gallery to an exhibition abroad or to take cultural goods abroad temporarily for sale or private enjoyment, you may need a temporary export licence from the Export Licensing Unit of the [Arts Council.](http://www.artscouncil.org.uk/what-we-do/supporting-museums/cultural-property/export-controls/export-licensing/ "Arts Council"){:rel="external"}

details.description: Applying for licences from your council for events and businesses
Information about starting up and running a business in the UK, including help if you're self employed or a sole trader.
